course.title: Introduction to Functions and Calculus II
course.meeting_text: Section I: M., W., F., at 10; Section II: M. W., F., at 11; Section III: M., W., F., at 12 (with sufficient enrollment); and a twice weekly lab session to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: Sarah Chisholm, Upendra Prasad, and members of the Department
course.description: Continued investigation of functions and differential calculus through modeling; an introduction to integration with applications; an introduction to differential equations. Solid preparation for Mathematics 1b.
course.notes: Required first Meeting in spring: Monday, January 26, 8:30 am, Science Center A . Participation in two, one hour workshops are required each week. This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the General Education requirement for Empirical and Mathematical Reasoning. This course, when taken for a letter grade together with Mathematics Ma.
